## VirtualScrollPagingOptions.loadOffsetTreshold property

Offset between 0 and 1 which indicates when to start loading next page, 0.8 means 80% of scrolling distance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadOffsetTreshold?: number;
```
